visualcryptography
Class VisualCryptography

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  visualcryptography.VisualCryptography
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class VisualCryptography
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This is the base class of the application that implements VisualCryptography. This class is responsible for all the action that we performed.

Since:
6.25.05
Author:
Edward P. Legaspi

isAvailableLookAndFeel

public boolean isAvailableLookAndFeel(java.lang.String laf)

delTree

public void delTree(java.lang.String f)
Removes all the files and subdirectories found at the root directory/temp of the class. The directory removed was created prior to encryption it serves as a virtual directory for temporary image files.

public void setStatus(java.lang.String s)

Submit a bug or feature at laizzez_faire07(@)yahoo.com. Visual Cryptography is an implementation of the newly discovered and developed visual encryption algorithm by Naor and Shamir at the Eurocrypt 1994. Copyright 2005 University of the Philippines, Los Baos, Laguna. All rights reserved.
